DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect daily administration multivitamin supplement dose resemble Recommended Dietary Allowance ( RDA ) pregnancy HIV positive woman decrease risk low birth weight ( < 2500 g ) , pre-term birth ( < 37 week gestation ) , compare multivitamin supplement dose RDA .
DOC.brief_title: Multivitamin Dosage Regimens Prevention Adverse Pregnancy Outcomes Among HIV-Positive Women
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial conduct examine effect daily administration multivitamin supplement dose resemble Recommended Dietary Allowance ( RDA ) pregnancy HIV positive woman decrease risk low birth weight ( < 2500 g ) , pre-term birth ( < 37 week gestation ) , compare multivitamin supplement dose RDA . All woman receive standard prenatal care , include nevirapine prevention mother-to-child transmission HIV .
DOC.criteria: HIVpositive pregnant woman 12 27 week gestation intend stay Dar e Salaam delivery .
